aspecttable.name: AAR-2
aspecttable.reference: As described in the August 1946 version of the AAR publication "American Railway Signaling Principles and Practices", chapter II.

aspect.name: Advance Approach Medium
aspect.title: Rule 281A
aspect.indication: Proceed approaching second signal at medium speed

aspect.name: Approach Limited
aspect.title: Rule 281B
aspect.indication: Proceed approaching next signal at limited speed

aspect.name: Limited-Clear
aspect.title: Rule 281C
aspect.indication: Proceed; limited speed within interlocking limits

aspect.name: Approach Medium
aspect.title: Rule 282
aspect.indication: Proceed approaching next signal at medium speed

aspect.name: Advance Approach
aspect.title: Rule 282A
aspect.indication: Proceed preparing to stop at second signal

aspect.name: Medium-Clear
aspect.title: Rule 283
aspect.indication: Proceed; medium speed within interlocking limits

aspect.name: Medium-Advance Approach
aspect.title: Rule 283A
aspect.indication: Proceed preparing to stop at second signal; medium speed within interlocking limits

aspect.name: Medium-Approach Slow
aspect.title: Rule 283B
aspect.indication: Proceed at medium speed approaching next signal at slow speed

aspect.name: Approach Slow
aspect.title: Rule 284
aspect.indication: Proceed approaching next signal at slow speed. Train exceeding medium speed must at once reduce to that speed.

aspect.name: Approach
aspect.title: Rule 285
aspect.indication: Proceed preparing to stop at next signal. Train exceeding medium speed must at once reduce to that speed.

aspect.name: Medium-Approach
aspect.title: Rule 286
aspect.indication: Proceed at medium speed preparing to stop at next signal

aspect.name: Slow-Clear
aspect.title: Rule 287
aspect.indication: Proceed; slow speed within interlocking limits.

aspect.name: Slow-Approach
aspect.title: Rule 288
aspect.indication: Proceed preparing to stop at next signal; slow speed within interlocking limits.

aspect.name: Permissive
aspect.title: Rule 289
aspect.indication: Block occupied; proceed prepared to stop short of train ahead.

aspect.name: Stop And Proceed
aspect.title: Rule 291
aspect.indication: Stop; then proceed at restricted speed.
